item.description:
Ok! Let's shake off the lethargy of summer and get back to work on this Ruby stuff!

The location is at The MathWorks, Apple Hill 1 - The Atlantis Converence Room. Details are in the message boards. Sign up now in the message boards for topics, rants, questions, or your hearts desire.

Here is the link to September's shiny new thread.

http://ruby.meetup.co...
item.name: The Metrowest Ruby Users Group September Meetup
